title: What is the source of the horrible cat urine-like odor that sometimes permeates downtown?
text:
We've looked into this question before, and what you're smelling is
a sweet mix of booze, mixed drinks, and yes, urine. As with most
downtown streets, that combo gives you a slightly different smell in
each area, but alleys and sidewalks aren't cleaned thoroughly (or at
all) so the odor stays. And if you're smelling cat urine in some
areas, chances are it's cat urine.
